CustomField.description: Show price increase or discount against Default Price by %. In case of increase, ""+ X%"", in case of discount, ""- X%"", and in case of no gap, ""0%""
CustomField.formula: IF(Discount_percentage__c>0, "-"&TEXT(ROUND(Discount_percentage__c*100, 3)) & "%", IF( Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c = 0, "0%", IF( Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c > Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c, "+"&TEXT(ABS(ROUND(((Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c - Sales_Price_ARR_One_off__c) / Default_Price_ARR_One_off__c) * 100, 3)))&"%", "0%")))
CustomField.label: Price Change
